metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23214 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: When the server is configured to use trust authentication with a clientcertrequirement or to use cert authentication, a man-in-the-middle attacker caninject arbitrary SQL queries when a connection is first established,despite the use of SSL certificate verification and encryption.

criterions.comment: postgresql-9.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
postgresql-9.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
